Package com.norswap.nanoeth.rlp

Class RLPParsing

java.lang.Object
com.norswap.nanoeth.rlp.RLPParsing
public final class RLPParsing
extends Object
Utilities to help parse protocol objects from RLP input.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Address getAddress​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array, into an address.
    static BloomFilter getBloomFilter​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array, into a bloom filter.
    static byte[] getBytes​(RLP seq, int i)
    Retrieves the i-th item of the sequence, and verifies that it is a byte array with a valid size.
    static Hash getHash​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array, into a hash.
    static int getInt​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array, into a 32-bit integer.
    static long getInt64​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a 8-byte array, into a 64-bit integer.
    static MerkleRoot getMerkleRoot​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array, into a hash.
    static Natural getNatural​(RLP seq, int i)
    Parses the i-th item of the sequence, which should be a byte array of size no greater than 32, into a natural number.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
